DOC.brief_summary: This study use interactive design development process develop tailor message align YMSM 's relationship experience desire HIV prevention strategy . The study include tailor online prevention , intervention , well attention control non -- tailor HIV prevention ( NTHP ) comparison intervention . The pilot RCT compare intervention ( N=120 ) NTHP ( N=60 ) ass intervention feasibility acceptability , gather preliminary behavioral data inform subsequent application . Follow-up assessment collect thirty ( 30 ) , sixty ( 60 ) , ninety ( 90 ) day post-intervention .
DOC.brief_title: Development Tailored HIV Prevention Intervention Young Men
DOC.detailed_description: A resurgence new HIV case among young men sex men ( YMSM ; age 18 -- 24 ) underscore importance develop culturally- developmentally- inform HIV program YMSM . The investigator develop pilot testing tailor , web- base intervention call myDEx focus deliver HIV prevention message base single YMSM 's relationship expectation partner -- seek behavior . To maximize intervention appeal appropriateness , investigator convene youth advisory board ( YAB ) provide insight feedback 3 -- stage intervention development process . Using iterative design development process , develop tailor message align YMSM 's relationship experience desire HIV prevention strategy . The investigator design develop myDEx tailor online prevention intervention , well attention- control non -- tailored HIV/AIDS prevention ( NTHP ) comparison intervention . After develop intervention , investigator use usability testing procedure collect preliminary data 16 YMSM propose intervention 's design acceptability . Recommended change add intervention prior launch small pilot randomize control trial ( RCT ) . The pilot RCT compare myDEx ( N=120 ) NTHP ( N=60 ) ass intervention feasibility acceptability , gather preliminary behavioral data inform subsequent application . Assessments collect 30 , 60 , 90 day follow -- . Specific Aims include : 1 . To develop tailor ( myDEx ) non-tailored ( NTHP ) HIV prevention intervention focus address HIV risk behavior among single YMSM ; 2 . To collect preliminary data feasibility , acceptability , intervention content myDEx ( N=16 ) preparation small pilot RCT ; , 3 . To implement small pilot RCT refine myDEx ( N=120 ) compare NTHP ( N=60 ) intervention , order evaluate feasibility acceptability gather preliminary efficacy result reduce sexual risk behavior .
DOC.criteria: Cisgender male Selfreport single Self report HIVnegative baseline Speak read English Report unprotected anal intercourse male partner prior six ( 6 ) month Have access computer smartphone device Transgender identity HIV positive diagnosis Not reside United States Does engage maletomale sexual behavior
